decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing Primeval Titan to search for key lands, such as The One Ring and Urza's Saga, to generate powerful combo plays. By utilizing Amulet of Vigor to untap lands, the deck can quickly ramp up and generate large amounts of mana to cast powerful spells and creatures. The deck also includes various land utility lands like Gruul Turf and Lotus Field to help fix mana and provide additional value. Overall, the strategy of the deck revolves around ramping up quickly and utilizing lands to create explosive plays and overwhelm the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul and Ulamog. The deck includes cards like Devourer of Destiny and Sowing Mycospawn to help ramp up mana quickly, while control cards like Kozilek's Command and All Is Dust help to control the board. Through the Breach allows for cheating out Eldrazi creatures early, while cards like Ancient Stirrings help find key pieces of the deck. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with huge, hard-to-answer threats while disrupting their game plan with control elements.

This deck focuses on quickly putting pressure on the opponent using aggressive creatures like Orcish Bowmasters, Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, and Scion of Draco. The deck also utilizes powerful spells like Lightning Bolt, Stubborn Denial, and Tribal Flames to control the board and finish off opponents. Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact provide additional support for the deck's strategy. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion ensures consistency and allows for additional mana ramp. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements while maximizing efficiency.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog and Emrakul. It also includes control elements like Sowing Mycospawn and Kozilek's Command to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Through the Breach allows for a quick and unexpected summoning of Eldrazi, while cards like All Is Dust provide board wipes to deal with threats. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big, hard-to-handle creatures while controlling the game and dictating the pace of play.

This deck focuses on utilizing creatures and spells that manipulate the opponent's board and hand while building up mana with Lotus Bloom to cast powerful spells such as Hydroelectric Specimen and Thundertrap Trainer. The win condition revolves around getting Goblin Charbelcher on the battlefield and activating its ability to deal massive amounts of damage to the opponent. The deck also includes counterspells and card draw to control the game and find key pieces of the combo. It is a fast-paced and high-risk/high-reward deck that aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game using a combination of disruption spells, counterspells, and removals while utilizing creatures with strong abilities to maintain board presence. The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Spell Snare, while also using cards like Fatal Push and Counterspell to deal with threats. The creatures like Psychic Frog and Abhorrent Oculus provide additional value with their abilities, helping to control the game and ultimately come out on top.
